blocks.content:
Every year, HKN inducts two induction classes: one in fall, and one in winter. Induction into HKN is a powerful way to demonstrate your potential and accomplishments to your future employers and/or institutions.

If you have any questions about the induction process after viewing this page and the FAQ at the bottom, feel free to email us at [hkn@eng.ucsd.edu](mailto:hkn@eng.ucsd.edu).

## Overview

***

To officially induct into Eta Kappa Nu (Kappa Psi), inductees must:

1. Receive an email invitation.
2. Begin the induction process by filling out the Induction Start Form, and attending an Informational Session.
3. Accumulate 10 HKN points, one of which must be a meeting with your HKN buddy, and another of which must be a Professional Workshop.
4. Attend and pass an hour-long interview at the end of the induction cycle.
5. Attend the mandatory HKN Induction Ceremony, and pay the one-time $90 membership fee.

## Invitations

***

We send email invitations to all students meeting the requirements, **with the exception of COGS-ML majors**. _(If you are a COGS-ML major interested in inducting, please email us at [hkn@eng.ucsd.edu](mailto:hkn@eng.ucsd.edu))._

**GPA Cutoff:**

* top 1/3 of the senior standing or graduate class
* top 1/4 of the junior standing class
* top 1/5 of the sophomore standing class

**Eligible Majors:** ECE, CSE, MAE, BENG, DSC, MATH-CS, COGS-ML, NANO-EE

## Requirements

***

To successfully become a full member of HKN, inductees must obtain a minimum of 10 points. Points can be obtained by attending or helping out with HKN events.

Points must come from the following categories:

**1 point: Professional Development Workshop**

* Example Professional Development Workshops include Resume Workshops, Interview Workshops, Elevator Pitch Workshops, and Problem Solving Sessions.

**1 point: Technical Event**

* Example Technical Events hands-on workshops, intros to programming languages, and tech talks.

**2 points: Social Events**

The remaining 5 points can be obtained by any mix of info sessions, Professional Development Workshops, Social Events, Outreach Trips, volunteering at an HKN event, and more!

If you have questions about whether an event can count as a point, and/or what category an event lies under, feel free to email us at [hkn@eng.ucsd.edu](mailto:hkn@eng.ucsd.edu).

|  |  |  |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **1 point: Buddies 1-on-1 chat** |  |  |
|  |  |  |

* If you have a specific officer you would like to be buddies with, feel free to reach out to them! Otherwise, you can use the general buddy sign-up sheet.

| **1 point: Professional Development Workshop** |  |  |
